price: 39. Maalinkaas waxba lagama weydiiyo denbigooda Insi iyo Jinba (oo waa cad yihiin oo la og yahay, waase lagu qiri).
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
